get.summary: Get all addresses for a user

post.summary: Request a One-Time Password (OTP) for a specific purpose.
post.description:
OTP purposes supported: `Login`, `PasswordReset`, `EmailVerification`, `Payment`.  
- If the purpose is `Login`, a JWT token is returned along with a refresh token.
 provide `Email`  identify the user.  
If the user does not exist, the endpoint returns `404 Not Found`.

requestBody.description: DTO containing the user's email or phone number and the OTP purpose.

400.description: Invalid request (missing purpose or invalid data).

post.description:
Provide the OTP code, purpose, and either Email or PhoneNumber.  
OTP purposes supported: `Login`, `PasswordReset`, `EmailVerification`, `Payment`.  
- If the purpose is `Login`, a JWT token is returned along with a refresh token.
- Returns 400 if the OTP is invalid or expired.
- Returns 404 if the user does not exist.

requestBody.description: DTO containing the user's email/phone, OTP code, and purpose.

post.summary: Authenticates a user using a Google ID Token.

200.description: Returns an DepiFinalProject.Core.DTOs.AuthenticationDTO.AuthenticationResponse containing JWT access token and refresh token.

401.description: Returned when the Google ID Token is invalid or authentication fails.

get.summary: Get the current user's cart with all items.

delete.summary: Remove all items from the current user's cart.

get.summary: Get a specific item in the current user's cart.

post.summary: Add a product to the current user's cart.

put.summary: Update the quantity of a specific product in the cart.

delete.summary: Remove a specific item from the current user's cart.

get.summary: Get all categories.

post.summary: Upload an icon for a category (Admin only).

delete.summary: Delete the icon of a category (Admin only).

get.summary: Get a specific category by ID.
Get all orders (admin)
Get a single order by its ID
Get all orders belonging to a specific user

post.summary: Create an order from the current user's cart (Checkout)

Create a new PayPal payment for an order
Amount is automatically retrieved from the order

get.summary: Get all payments (admin only)
Get payment by ID (admin or the payment owner)
Get all payments for a specific user (admin or the user themselves)
Retrieves all products from the system
get.description: Returns a list of all available products with their basic information including category and seller details.

200.description: Returns the list of products successfully

400.description: If an error occurs while fetching products

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

403.description: If the user doesn't have the required role

post.description:
Creates a new product in the system. The seller ID is automatically assigned from the authenticated user.

Sample request:

    POST /api/product
    {
        "categoryId": 1,
        "name": "Wireless Mouse",
        "description": "Ergonomic wireless mouse with USB receiver",
        "price": 29.99,
        "stock": 100,
        "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/mouse.jpg"
    }

400.description: If the product data is invalid or an error occurs

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

403.description: If the user doesn't have seller or admin role

get.summary: Retrieves a specific product by its ID
get.description: Returns detailed information about a product including reviews and ratings.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product

400.description: If an error occurs while fetching the product

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

403.description: If the user doesn't have the required role

404.description: If the product with the specified ID is not found

put.description:
Updates product information. Only the product owner or an admin can update a product.
All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

Sample request:

    PUT /api/product/5
    {
        "name": "Updated Product Name",
        "price": 39.99,
        "stock": 150
    }

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product to update

400.description: If an error occurs during update

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

403.description: If the user is not authorized to update this product

404.description: If the product is not found

delete.description: Permanently deletes a product from the system. Only the product owner or an admin can delete a product.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product to delete

400.description: If an error occurs during deletion

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

403.description: If the user is not authorized to delete this product

404.description: If the product is not found

get.summary: Retrieves all products created by the currently authenticated user
get.description:
Returns a list of products that belong to the logged-in seller or admin user.
The user ID is automatically extracted from the authentication token.

200.description: Returns the list of user's products successfully (may be empty)

400.description: If an error occurs while fetching products

401.description: If the user is not authenticated or user ID is invalid

403.description: If the user doesn't have seller or admin role

get.summary: Retrieves all products created by a specific user (Admin only)
get.description: Admin-only endpoint that returns all products belonging to any user in the system.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user

200.description: Returns the list of user's products successfully

400.description: If an error occurs while fetching products

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

403.description: If the user doesn't have admin role

404.description: If no products are found for the specified user

delete.summary: Delete a specific image from a product.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: The ID of the image to delete.

401.description: Unauthorized if user does not have seller/admin role.

post.summary:
Add image URLs to a specific product (Cloudinary URLs).
Only admins and sellers can perform this action.

401.description: Unauthorized if user is not seller/admin.

delete.summary: Delete all images associated with a product.

404.description: No images found for the product.

401.description: Unauthorized if user does not have seller/admin role.

get.summary: Get all reviews for a specific product.
Get a single review by id.
Get all reviews of this user.

post.summary: Upload or update the user's profile image.
post.description:
Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, WEBP  
Max recommended size: 1MB  
Returns the Cloudinary secure URL.

get.summary: Get all wishlist items for the logged-in user.
Get a specific wishlist item by product ID.

post.summary: Add a product to the wishlist.

delete.summary: Remove a product from the wishlist.
